author: PhenoM4n4n
install_msg:
Thank you for installing CustomPing.
 Note that this replaces the `ping` command with a new embedded one, so users will be unable to run the command if the bot doesn't have embed permissions.
description: Creates a custom ping embed to display latency statistics.
short: Creates a custom ping embed to display latency statistics.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
